mapper.select: SELECT u.no, u.email, u.password, u.nickname, u.birthday, u.fail_count, ua.id, ua.name as "aname" FROM user u, (SELECT users_authority.users_no, authority.id, authority.name FROM users_authority, authority WHERE users_authority.authority_id = authority.id) ua WHERE u.no = ua.users_no AND u.user_no = #{userNo}

SELECT u.user_no, u.email, u.password, u.nickname, u.birthday, u.fail_count, ua.id, ua.name as "aname" FROM user u, (SELECT users_authority.users_no, authority.id, authority.name FROM users_authority, authority WHERE users_authority.authority_id = authority.id) ua WHERE u.user_no = ua.users_no AND u.email = #{email}
